signals.title: DeepSeek releases breakthrough AI training method mHC for efficient model scaling
signals.description: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek published Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections (mHC) training method in January 2026, described as a striking breakthrough for scaling models without instability at minimal cost. Represents potential paradigm shift in AI training economics and China's position in global AI race.
signals.leading_indicator: Democratization of AI training beyond hyperscaler monopoly; China's AI self-sufficiency despite chip restrictions
signals.significance_reason: First-of-its-kind training method that could fundamentally alter AI economics and geopolitical AI competition. Challenges assumption that only US Big Tech can afford frontier model training.

potential_impact.short_term: Increased global competition in frontier AI training; validation attempts by other labs
potential_impact.mid_term: Shift in AI startup economics if training costs decrease dramatically; policy responses to China AI advancement
potential_impact.long_term: Reshaping of global AI power structure; new era of distributed AI development

signals.title: CES 2026: Physical AI and humanoid robots dominate with 40 companies showcasing
signals.description: CES 2026 (Jan 6-9) marked physical AI as the dominant theme with 40 companies mentioning humanoid robots. NVIDIA Cosmos, Boston Dynamics Atlas, and numerous startups signal inflection point from digital to embodied AI.
signals.leading_indicator: Mass commercialization of humanoid robots within 2-3 years; physical AI as next frontier after LLMs
signals.significance_reason: CES momentum signals industry-wide shift from pure software AI to embodied intelligence. 40 companies represents critical mass for ecosystem formation.

potential_impact.short_term: Accelerated robotics investment; hardware-AI integration race
potential_impact.mid_term: First wave of commercial humanoid deployments in manufacturing, logistics, services
potential_impact.long_term: Human-robot coexistence as new normal; profound labor market transformation

signals.title: D-Wave announces acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M to accelerate quantum computing
signals.description: D-Wave announced on Jan 7, 2026 acquisition of Quantum Circuits Inc. for $550M ($300M stock + $250M cash) with initial dual-rail system planned for general availability in 2026. Represents major consolidation in quantum computing industry.
signals.leading_indicator: Quantum computing industry consolidation phase; shift from R&D to commercial viability focus
signals.significance_reason: Largest quantum computing M&A to date signals maturation from pure research to commercial race. Integration of annealing + gate-based approaches.

potential_impact.short_term: Industry consolidation continues; quantum startup valuations reassessed
potential_impact.mid_term: Unified quantum platforms emerge combining multiple qubit architectures
potential_impact.long_term: Quantum computing oligopoly similar to semiconductor industry structure

actors.name: D-Wave
actors.role: Quantum annealing leader acquiring gate-based technology

signals.title: IBM predicts quantum advantage verification by end of 2026 with 7,500-gate systems
signals.description: IBM anticipates first verified quantum advantage cases by end of 2026, with future Nighthawk iterations delivering up to 7,500 gates. Represents concrete timeline for practical quantum computing applications.
signals.leading_indicator: 2026 as inflection year for quantum computing commercial viability; end of 'quantum winter' skepticism
signals.significance_reason: IBM's timeline provides concrete milestone for quantum advantage verification, validating decades of R&D investment.

potential_impact.short_term: Increased enterprise quantum pilot programs; skill development urgency
potential_impact.mid_term: First commercial quantum applications in drug discovery, materials science, optimization
potential_impact.long_term: Quantum-classical hybrid computing as standard enterprise infrastructure

signals.title: 양자컴퓨터 2026년 상용화 원년, IBM '강한 양자 우위' 선언
signals.description: IBM은 CES 2026에서 2026년 말까지 '강한 양자 우위(strong quantum advantage)' 실현을 공식 예측했으며, 양자컴퓨터가 슈퍼컴을 넘어서는 원년이 될 것으로 전망. 한국 언론도 양자컴퓨팅 상용화 시점으로 2026년을 주목.
signals.leading_indicator: 글로벌 양자컴퓨팅 경쟁 심화; 한국 등 후발국의 양자 기술 투자 가속화
signals.significance_reason: 양자우위 실현이 실험실에서 상용 영역으로 전환되는 역사적 시점. 한국 언론 보도는 글로벌 관심도 반영.

potential_impact.short_term: 한국 정부 양자컴퓨팅 R&D 예산 증액; 대기업 양자 TF 구성
potential_impact.mid_term: 한국형 양자컴퓨터 개발 로드맵 구체화; 국가 양자 인프라 구축
potential_impact.long_term: 양자 기술 주권 경쟁 격화; 양자-AI 융합 기술 리더십 경쟁

signals.title: NVIDIA introduces Cosmos physical AI models and announces Vera Rubin AI superchip in production
signals.description: At CES 2026, NVIDIA released Cosmos and GR00T open models for robot learning, Isaac Lab-Arena for evaluation, and OSMO edge-to-cloud framework. Announced Vera Rubin next-gen AI superchip platform in full production. Siemens partnership for industrial AI robotics.
signals.leading_indicator: Physical AI becoming standardized platform play; NVIDIA extending dominance from digital to embodied AI
signals.significance_reason: NVIDIA's comprehensive physical AI stack (models, chips, frameworks) mirrors their success in LLM infrastructure. Vera Rubin in production signals near-term commercial readiness.

potential_impact.short_term: Physical AI development acceleration; robotics startups adopting NVIDIA stack
potential_impact.mid_term: NVIDIA-powered humanoid robots in factories, warehouses, service industries
potential_impact.long_term: NVIDIA as de facto physical AI infrastructure standard; new AI hardware-software integration paradigm

signals.title: CRISPR epigenetic editing breakthrough: gene activation without DNA cutting
signals.description: UNSW Sydney researchers developed new CRISPR-based epigenetic editing that switches genes on/off without cutting DNA by removing chemical tags. CRISPR Therapeutics CTX460 trial planned mid-2026. Represents safer gene therapy paradigm.
signals.leading_indicator: Gene therapy safety breakthrough enabling broader clinical applications; epigenetics as new frontier
signals.significance_reason: First-of-its-kind approach eliminating DNA cutting risk. Paradigm shift from gene editing to gene regulation without permanent changes.

potential_impact.short_term: Accelerated clinical trials for epigenetic therapies; regulatory pathway debates
potential_impact.mid_term: Safer treatments for genetic diseases; expanded patient eligibility
potential_impact.long_term: Reversible gene therapy as standard; human enhancement ethical debates intensify

signals.title: Neuralink plans high-volume brain-computer interface production with automated surgery in 2026
signals.description: Neuralink announced plans to begin high-volume production and fully automated surgical procedures for brain-computer interface devices by 2026. Represents transition from experimental to scalable neurotechnology.
signals.leading_indicator: Brain-computer interfaces transitioning from niche medical to broader adoption; automation enabling mass deployment
signals.significance_reason: Automated surgery removes major scalability bottleneck. High-volume production signals commercial viability beyond early trials.

potential_impact.short_term: Expanded clinical trials; regulatory scrutiny on automated neurosurgery
potential_impact.mid_term: BCI treatments for paralysis, neurological conditions becoming accessible
potential_impact.long_term: Human augmentation via BCI normalization; cognitive enhancement debates

signals.title: FCC approves SpaceX plan to deploy 7,500 additional Starlink satellites, total 15,000
signals.description: FCC approved SpaceX deployment of 7,500 more Gen2 Starlink satellites on Jan 10, 2026, bringing total to 15,000 worldwide. Includes Direct-to-Cell capabilities for mobile connectivity.
signals.leading_indicator: Global satellite internet as ubiquitous utility; erosion of terrestrial telecom monopolies
signals.significance_reason: 15,000 satellites represents unprecedented space infrastructure. Direct-to-Cell bypasses traditional mobile carriers.

potential_impact.short_term: Telecom industry disruption; rural connectivity gap closure
potential_impact.mid_term: Global internet access universalization; emerging market leapfrogging
potential_impact.long_term: Space-based communications as critical infrastructure; orbital debris governance challenges

signals.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems SPARC reactor targets first plasma in 2026
signals.description: Commonwealth Fusion Systems plans to complete SPARC commissioning by end of 2025 and generate first plasma in 2026. Represents major milestone toward commercial fusion energy.
signals.leading_indicator: Commercial fusion energy timeline acceleration; 2030s as potential fusion deployment decade
signals.significance_reason: First plasma in SPARC would be world's first net-energy fusion demonstration by private company. Validates fusion investment wave.

potential_impact.short_term: Fusion investment surge; talent migration from fission to fusion
potential_impact.mid_term: Fusion energy pilot plants in 2030s; energy policy incorporating fusion roadmaps
potential_impact.long_term: Fusion as baseload clean energy; fundamental restructuring of energy geopolitics

signals.title: AI agents market to surge from $7.8B to $52B by 2030, 40% enterprise adoption in 2026
signals.description: Agentic AI market projected to surge from $7.8B today to $52B by 2030. Gartner predicts 40% of enterprise applications will embed AI agents by end of 2026. Represents shift from tools to autonomous systems.
signals.leading_indicator: AI agents becoming enterprise standard; automation transitioning from task to workflow level
signals.significance_reason: 40% enterprise adoption in 2026 represents critical mass for AI agents as new software paradigm. 6.7x market growth in 4 years signals explosive adoption.

potential_impact.short_term: AI agent platform competition intensifies; enterprise AI budgets shift to agentic systems
potential_impact.mid_term: White-collar work restructuring around human-agent collaboration
potential_impact.long_term: Majority of knowledge work mediated by AI agents; new organizational structures emerge

signals.title: LongBio longevity biotech positioned for breakout at JP Morgan 2026 conference
signals.description: LongGame Longevity Biotech Demo Day took place Jan 9, 2026 ahead of JP Morgan conference, signaling convergence of longevity with mainstream biotech. Institutional investors showing serious interest in aging research.
signals.leading_indicator: Longevity biotech transitioning from niche to mainstream investment category; aging treated as solvable problem
signals.significance_reason: JP Morgan Healthcare Conference is world's largest biotech investor event. Longevity biotech presence signals institutional acceptance.

potential_impact.short_term: Longevity biotech funding surge; major pharma partnerships
potential_impact.mid_term: First anti-aging therapies entering clinical trials; regulatory pathways established
potential_impact.long_term: Human healthspan extension by decades; societal restructuring around extended lifespans

signals.title: AI can now design proteins and DNA, scientists warn biosecurity rules urgently needed
signals.description: AI technology can now design entirely novel synthetic molecules from DNA to proteins, with relative novices able to design using open source AI software. Scientists warn biosecurity governance framework urgently needed before dual-use risks materialize.
signals.leading_indicator: Democratized bioweapon design capability; urgent need for AI-biosecurity governance intersection
signals.significance_reason: AI-enabled synthetic biology represents existential risk class. Open source availability means regulatory window closing rapidly.

potential_impact.short_term: Emergency biosecurity policy initiatives; open source AI model restrictions debated
potential_impact.mid_term: International biosecurity treaties updated for AI era; compute governance for bio-AI
potential_impact.long_term: Fundamental tension between open science and existential risk; new global governance frameworks

signals.title: TSMC revenue beats estimates, AI chip demand outstrips supply through 2026
signals.description: TSMC reported Jan 9, 2026 revenue topping estimates with sustained AI spending. 2025 revenue hit record $113B (36% YoY increase). AI chip demand continues to outstrip manufacturing capacity.
signals.leading_indicator: AI infrastructure bottleneck persisting through 2026; semiconductor geopolitics intensifying
signals.significance_reason: TSMC's capacity constraints signal sustained AI chip shortage. 36% YoY growth indicates AI infrastructure spending far from peak.

potential_impact.short_term: AI project delays due to chip availability; premium pricing for advanced nodes
potential_impact.mid_term: Geographic diversification of chip manufacturing; supply chain resilience investments
potential_impact.long_term: Semiconductor self-sufficiency as national security priority; geopolitical chip architecture

signals.title: Cellular agriculture moves beyond startup phase to public-sector institutional backing
signals.description: At 2026 Tufts Future Food Innovation Day (January), experts noted cellular agriculture shifting from startup economics to public-sector and institutional backing. Cultivated meat entering mainstream investment conversation.
signals.leading_indicator: Cultivated meat transitioning from venture-backed to government-supported strategic sector
signals.significance_reason: Public-sector backing signals recognition of cellular agriculture as food security and climate solution, not just venture speculation.

potential_impact.short_term: Government R&D funding for cellular agriculture; regulatory pathway clarity
potential_impact.mid_term: First commercial-scale cultivated meat production facilities; price parity approaching
potential_impact.long_term: Alternative proteins as majority food source; livestock agriculture restructuring

signals.title: Textile recycling technologies to process 8M tons waste annually by 2030, up from <1M today
signals.description: 2026 textile recycling landscape represents maturation toward true circular material cycles with chemical depolymerization, fiber regeneration, automated sorting. Projected to process 8M tons annually by 2030 vs. <1M today.
signals.leading_indicator: Fast fashion circular economy becoming technically viable; textile waste crisis solutions scaling
signals.significance_reason: 8x capacity increase in 4 years represents inflection point from pilot to industrial scale. Chemical recycling breakthrough enabling true circularity.

potential_impact.short_term: Fast fashion brands adopting recycling targets; investment in recycling infrastructure
potential_impact.mid_term: Textile-to-textile recycling as standard; virgin fiber demand reduction
potential_impact.long_term: Circular fashion economy achieved; textile waste eliminated as environmental problem

signals.title: Global venture capital deployment expected to increase 10% to high $400B in 2026
signals.description: Global VC deployment expected to increase to high $400B mark in 2026, implying 10% increase from 2025's $339.4B. American VCs spent 65.4% of deal money on AI/ML in 2025, with 14% concentrated in OpenAI and Anthropic alone.
signals.leading_indicator: AI investment concentration intensifying; venture capital becoming AI-dominated asset class
signals.significance_reason: 65.4% AI concentration unprecedented in VC history. Two companies (OpenAI, Anthropic) absorbing 14% of all US VC capital signals winner-take-most dynamics.

potential_impact.short_term: Non-AI startups face funding challenges; AI talent war intensifies
potential_impact.mid_term: VC industry restructures around AI specialization; alternative funding for non-AI innovation
potential_impact.long_term: AI oligopoly consolidation; potential innovation monoculture risks

signals.title: Goldman Sachs forecasts 2.8% global GDP growth in 2026, recession probability drops to 30%
signals.description: Goldman Sachs projects global GDP increase of 2.8% in 2026 (vs consensus 2.5%). Recession probability over next 12 months fallen to 30% from 40%, indicating economic resilience despite geopolitical uncertainties.
signals.leading_indicator: Economic soft landing achieved; growth resilience despite high interest rates
signals.significance_reason: Recession fears abating provides business confidence for investment. Above-consensus forecast signals stronger than expected economic foundation.

potential_impact.short_term: Business investment confidence increases; hiring resumes in cautious sectors
potential_impact.mid_term: Sustained economic expansion supporting innovation investment
potential_impact.long_term: Post-pandemic economic regime stabilizes at higher baseline growth

signals.title: Enterprise AI spending to increase in 2026 but consolidate to fewer vendors
signals.description: Overwhelming majority of enterprise-focused VCs predict enterprises will increase AI budgets in 2026, but concentrate spending with fewer contracts. Signals vendor consolidation and preference for comprehensive platforms over point solutions.
signals.leading_indicator: Enterprise AI market consolidating from fragmentation to platform dominance; AI tool sprawl correction
signals.significance_reason: Vendor consolidation while spending increases indicates market maturation. Enterprise AI shifting from experimentation to strategic infrastructure.

potential_impact.short_term: AI point solution startups struggle; platform players gain leverage
potential_impact.mid_term: Enterprise AI stack dominated by 3-5 major platforms; integration over innovation
potential_impact.long_term: AI infrastructure oligopoly similar to cloud computing (AWS/Azure/GCP pattern)

signals.title: Space economy moving toward $1 trillion valuation by 2040, CES highlights growth
signals.description: Space economy moving toward $1T valuation with JPMorgan calculating growth from $447B to over $1T by 2040. SpaceX projected revenue $15B in 2025, increasing to $22-24B in 2026. CES 2026 showcased commercial space momentum.
signals.leading_indicator: Space commercialization accelerating beyond launch to manufacturing, tourism, resource extraction
signals.significance_reason: Trillion-dollar space economy milestone within 15 years signals fundamental economic expansion beyond Earth. SpaceX revenue trajectory validates commercial model.

potential_impact.short_term: Space investment surge; sovereign space programs accelerate
potential_impact.mid_term: Space manufacturing, tourism, satellite services become major economic sectors
potential_impact.long_term: Multi-planetary economy; space resources reshaping Earth economics

signals.title: 2026 will bring widespread job shifts as AI agents automate work, labor analysts warn
signals.description: Labor analysts say 2026 could be when AI technology begins reshaping job market in ways Americans actually feel. 2026 called 'year of agents' as AI expands from productivity to automating work itself. White-collar disruption intensifying.
signals.leading_indicator: AI job displacement transitioning from prediction to reality; 2026 as inflection year for labor market
signals.significance_reason: First year where AI automation becomes tangible in mainstream job market, not just theory. 'Year of agents' framing indicates industry-wide expectation of transformation.

potential_impact.short_term: White-collar layoffs blamed on AI; workforce anxiety and retraining urgency
potential_impact.mid_term: Labor market bifurcation: AI-augmented vs. AI-displaced roles; policy debates on transition support
potential_impact.long_term: Fundamental restructuring of work; universal basic income debates intensify

signals.title: AI/ML engineer salaries projected 4.1% increase in 2026, outpacing tech sector average
signals.description: Salaries for AI/ML Engineers and Data Scientists projected 4.1% increase in 2026, significantly outpacing general tech sector average. AI skills premium persists despite market normalization.
signals.leading_indicator: Sustained AI talent shortage despite increased training programs; AI skills as enduring premium
signals.significance_reason: Salary premium persistence indicates supply-demand imbalance continuing. AI skills remain scarce despite proliferation of training programs.

potential_impact.short_term: Continued AI talent competition; non-AI tech roles face salary stagnation
potential_impact.mid_term: AI education proliferation; career pivots to AI roles accelerate
potential_impact.long_term: AI skills as baseline expectation across knowledge work; premium erodes gradually

signals.title: UNEZA Alliance pledges $148B annually for renewable energy, transmission, and storage post-COP30
signals.description: Following COP30, UNEZA Alliance pledged annual commitments of $66B for renewable energy and $82B for transmission and storage. Represents largest coordinated climate finance commitment for energy transition infrastructure.
signals.leading_indicator: Climate finance transitioning from commitments to operational infrastructure spending; grid modernization as priority
signals.significance_reason: $148B annual commitment represents unprecedented climate finance scale focused on infrastructure (not just generation). Storage and transmission emphasis addresses renewable integration challenges.

potential_impact.short_term: Grid modernization projects accelerate globally; energy storage market boom
potential_impact.mid_term: Renewable energy curtailment eliminated; grid flexibility enables higher renewable penetration
potential_impact.long_term: Global energy infrastructure rebuilt for 100% renewable; fossil fuel stranded assets accelerate

signals.title: IRENA annual assembly Jan 10-12, 2026 to announce progress on tripling renewable energy
signals.description: International Renewable Energy Agency gathering ministers Jan 10-12, 2026 at Abu Dhabi headquarters for annual assembly to announce new insights on COP28 goals to triple renewable energy capacity by 2030.
signals.leading_indicator: Mid-decade checkpoint on renewable energy tripling goal; accountability for COP28 commitments
signals.significance_reason: IRENA assembly provides authoritative progress assessment on COP28's renewable tripling commitment. Mid-point measurement determines if 2030 goal achievable.

potential_impact.short_term: Renewable energy policy adjustments based on progress gaps; investment redirection
potential_impact.mid_term: Course correction for countries behind tripling trajectory; technology focus shifts
potential_impact.long_term: Renewable energy as majority power source by 2030; fossil fuel phase-out acceleration

signals.title: GE Vernova debuts 1,500-tonne/year commercial DAC unit in 2026, scalable to 50,000+ tonnes
signals.description: GE Vernova plans to debut 1,500-tonne-per-year commercial DAC unit in 2026 as first true product in their portfolio. Technology scalable to 50,000+ tonnes capacity. Represents industrial giant entering carbon removal market.
signals.leading_indicator: Direct air capture transitioning from startup projects to industrial-scale commercial products
signals.significance_reason: GE Vernova's entry signals DAC technology maturity attracting industrial conglomerates. Scalability pathway to 50,000+ tonnes demonstrates commercial viability confidence.

potential_impact.short_term: DAC market credibility boost; industrial players entering carbon removal
potential_impact.mid_term: DAC costs decrease through industrial manufacturing scale; megaton-scale deployments
potential_impact.long_term: Gigatonne-scale carbon removal infrastructure; negative emissions industry established

signals.title: Direct air capture industry growing with 20+ facilities operational worldwide by 2026
signals.description: More than 20 direct air capture facilities operating worldwide by 2026. Climeworks will deliver 50,000+ tons verified carbon removal credits per year by 2026. DAC industry transitioning from demonstration to operational phase.
signals.leading_indicator: DAC industry achieving operational scale; carbon removal credits becoming liquid market commodity
signals.significance_reason: 20+ facilities represents critical mass for DAC industry legitimacy. 50,000 tons/year from single provider shows commercial traction.

potential_impact.short_term: Carbon removal credit market growth; corporate net-zero strategies incorporate DAC
potential_impact.mid_term: DAC costs decrease through deployment learning curve; policy support mechanisms emerge
potential_impact.long_term: Megaton-scale DAC as standard climate mitigation tool; carbon removal industry maturity

signals.title: 한국 기후에너지환경부 2026년 예산 19.2조원, 재생에너지 지원 98.6% 증가
signals.description: 한국 기후에너지환경부 2026년 예산 19.2조원으로 2025년 대비 9.9% 증가. 재생에너지 금융 지원이 2025년 3,263억원에서 2026년 6,480억원으로 98.6% 증가. 분산전력망, ESS 투자 대폭 확대.
signals.leading_indicator: 한국 에너지 전환 가속화; 재생에너지 금융 지원 정책적 전환점
signals.significance_reason: 재생에너지 금융 지원 98.6% 증가는 정책 우선순위 극적 전환 신호. 분산전력망과 ESS 강조는 재생에너지 통합 인프라 집중 투자.

potential_impact.short_term: 한국 재생에너지 프로젝트 파이낸싱 활성화; ESS 설치 급증
potential_impact.mid_term: 분산전력망 확대로 재생에너지 비중 증가 가속; 전력망 안정성 향상
potential_impact.long_term: 한국 탄소중립 2050 목표 달성 가능성 제고; 에너지 자립도 향상

signals.title: Bangladesh and Pakistan set renewable energy records with solar installations
signals.description: Bangladesh off-grid home solar installations set global record, enabling rapid rural electrification. Pakistan's massive solar panel and battery purchases led country to abandon natural gas. South Asia renewable energy leapfrog underway.
signals.leading_indicator: Developing nations leapfrogging to renewables, bypassing fossil fuel infrastructure; off-grid solar as electrification pathway
signals.significance_reason: Bangladesh and Pakistan represent billion-person market adoption of decentralized renewable model. Natural gas abandonment in Pakistan signals renewable cost competitiveness tipping point.

potential_impact.short_term: South Asia solar market boom; off-grid electrification model exported globally
potential_impact.mid_term: Developing world skips centralized fossil fuel grid development; distributed energy paradigm
potential_impact.long_term: Global South energy independence via renewables; fossil fuel demand peak accelerates

actors.name: Pakistan
actors.role: Natural gas to solar transition leader

signals.title: Trump administration issues executive order preempting state AI laws, forms litigation task force
signals.description: Trump administration's policy to sustain US global AI dominance through minimally burdensome national framework. Attorney General directed to establish AI Litigation Task Force within 30 days to challenge state-level AI regulations. Federal preemption of Colorado algorithmic discrimination law targeted.
signals.leading_indicator: US AI regulatory fragmentation crisis; federal-state AI governance clash intensifying
signals.significance_reason: Federal preemption of state AI laws unprecedented intervention. AI Litigation Task Force signals aggressive legal campaign to establish federal supremacy in AI regulation.

potential_impact.short_term: State AI regulations challenged in court; regulatory uncertainty for AI companies
potential_impact.mid_term: Supreme Court showdown on AI regulatory authority; federal vs. state jurisdiction battle
potential_impact.long_term: US AI regulatory landscape determined by legal precedent; potential constitutional crisis

actors.name: Colorado
actors.role: State AI law target for preemption

signals.title: US-China relations enter 2026 with fragile trade truce, tech war intensifying over AI chips
signals.description: US-China relations entering 2026 with paradox: trade thawing in soybeans/metals (935 tariff items reduced from Jan 1) while tech war over AI chips and Taiwan military balance hardening. Selective decoupling strategy emerging.
signals.leading_indicator: US-China selective decoupling: economic pragmatism in commodities, zero-sum competition in strategic tech
signals.significance_reason: Paradoxical trade thaw + tech war intensification represents new era of compartmentalized US-China relations. Signals long-term coexistence strategy with technology as primary battleground.

potential_impact.short_term: AI chip export controls tighten; Taiwan military tensions escalate
potential_impact.mid_term: Bifurcated global tech ecosystem solidifies; countries forced to choose tech alignment
potential_impact.long_term: Permanent US-China strategic competition in AI/semiconductors; managed coexistence in other domains

signals.title: US plans new semiconductor tariffs on China starting June 2027 after Section 301 investigation
signals.description: US plans to install new tariffs on semiconductors from China starting June 23, 2027 following Section 301 investigation. Extends chip war timeline and signals long-term US industrial policy against Chinese semiconductor advancement.
signals.leading_indicator: Semiconductor decoupling timeline extended through 2027+; chip war becoming permanent feature
signals.significance_reason: 2027 tariff timeline indicates long-term US commitment to semiconductor industrial policy. Section 301 mechanism shows trade tool weaponization in tech competition.

potential_impact.short_term: Semiconductor supply chain reconfiguration accelerates; Chinese chip stockpiling
potential_impact.mid_term: Global semiconductor ecosystem bifurcates into US-aligned and China-aligned
potential_impact.long_term: Parallel chip technology standards emerge; permanent semiconductor Cold War

signals.title: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026, Digital Omnibus may extend high-risk timeline
signals.description: EU AI Act transparency rules take effect August 2026. Digital Omnibus proposals may extend high-risk processing timeline from Aug 2026 to Dec 2027. Member states must establish AI regulatory sandboxes by Aug 2, 2026.
signals.leading_indicator: EU AI regulation implementation phase begins; regulatory sandbox era for AI governance experimentation
signals.significance_reason: August 2026 transparency rules represent first enforceable EU AI Act provisions. Digital Omnibus timeline extension shows regulatory pragmatism balancing innovation and control.

potential_impact.short_term: AI companies scramble for August 2026 compliance; regulatory sandbox applications surge
potential_impact.mid_term: EU AI governance model tested in practice; global regulatory influence competition with US
potential_impact.long_term: Brussels Effect in AI: EU standards become de facto global norms or trigger regulatory fragmentation

signals.title: EU to publish first-ever Fusion Strategy by early 2026 shaping commercial fusion landscape
signals.description: EU's first-ever Fusion Strategy planned for publication by early 2026, which could shape commercial fusion landscape. Represents governmental recognition of fusion energy as viable near-term technology requiring strategic planning.
signals.leading_indicator: Fusion energy transitioning from research to industrial policy priority; government strategic planning for 2030s deployment
signals.significance_reason: First governmental fusion strategy signals policy expectation of commercialization timeline. EU positioning for fusion industrial leadership competition.

potential_impact.short_term: EU fusion R&D funding increase; regulatory pathway development for fusion energy
potential_impact.mid_term: European fusion startups and projects receive strategic government backing
potential_impact.long_term: EU fusion industry cluster formation; competition with US, China, Japan for fusion leadership

signals.title: Trump expected to visit China in April 2026, potential turning point in bilateral relations
signals.description: Trump expected to visit China in April 2026 alongside anticipated 2026 leader-level meetings at G-20 and APEC summits. Represents potential diplomatic reset opportunity amid ongoing strategic competition.
signals.leading_indicator: US-China diplomatic engagement resuming at leader level; managed competition framework emerging
signals.significance_reason: Presidential visit to China signals diplomatic channel restoration despite tech war. April 2026 timing allows for bilateral relationship recalibration.

potential_impact.short_term: US-China tensions de-escalate tactically; trade negotiations resume
potential_impact.mid_term: Strategic competition continues but with diplomatic guardrails; crisis communication channels established
potential_impact.long_term: Long-term US-China coexistence framework: strategic competition + selective cooperation

signals.title: Gen Z: 86% striving to reduce screen time, 2026 becomes year of digital minimalism
signals.description: 86% of Gen Z across US and Europe striving to reduce screen time. 2026 is when digital minimalism stops being niche and becomes mainstream movement. 81% of Gen Z workers believe digital detoxes should become routine workplace practice.
signals.leading_indicator: Digital backlash reaches critical mass; attention economy restructuring as Gen Z rejects maximalist engagement
signals.significance_reason: 86% Gen Z participation represents majority cultural shift, not fringe movement. Workplace expectation (81%) signals institutional pressure for digital minimalism.

potential_impact.short_term: Social media engagement decline; digital wellbeing app market growth
potential_impact.mid_term: Workplace policies incorporate digital boundaries; attention-respectful product design pressures
potential_impact.long_term: Post-smartphone era: devices as tools not identity; attention economy business models collapse

signals.title: One-week social media detox reduces anxiety by 16.1%, depression by 24.8% in studies
signals.description: Scientific study found one-week social media detox observed 16.1% reduction in anxiety symptoms and 24.8% decrease in depression symptoms. Provides empirical validation for digital minimalism mental health benefits.
signals.leading_indicator: Scientific evidence base for digital detox strengthening; mental health benefits quantified
signals.significance_reason: Double-digit mental health improvements from one-week intervention provides clinical-grade evidence. Legitimizes digital minimalism as mental health intervention.

potential_impact.short_term: Mental health professionals prescribing digital detoxes; insurance coverage debates
potential_impact.mid_term: Social media warning labels analogous to tobacco; youth digital consumption regulations
potential_impact.long_term: Social media platforms regulated as mental health hazards; duty of care legislation

signals.title: Workplaces adopting email-free Fridays, mental health days, four-day workweek pilots in 2026
signals.description: Organizations responding with four-day workweek pilots, mandatory mental health days, leadership training in psychological safety, and email-free Fridays. Workplace wellness moving from perks to structural redesign.
signals.leading_indicator: Workplace mental health transitioning from programs to systemic work redesign; four-day week mainstreaming
signals.significance_reason: Email-free Fridays and mandatory mental health days represent structural work culture changes, not cosmetic benefits. Four-day week pilots spreading beyond early adopters.

potential_impact.short_term: Talent competition drives workplace wellness adoption; productivity measurement debates
potential_impact.mid_term: Four-day week becomes standard in knowledge work; work-life boundaries enforced
potential_impact.long_term: Redefinition of full-time work; productivity decoupled from hours worked

signals.title: MZ세대 직장인 66.5%가 워라밸을 괜찮은 일자리 판단 1순위로 선택
signals.description: 괜찮은 일자리 판단 기준 묻는 질문에 응답자 66.5%가 '일과 삶의 균형이 맞춰지는 일자리' 선택. Z세대 32%, 밀레니얼 37%가 '일과 삶의 균형 능력'을 가장 선호. 한국은행 보고서에서 근무여건(31.5%)이 급여(26.8%)를 앞선 것으로 나타남.
signals.leading_indicator: 한국 노동시장 가치관 전환: 급여보다 워라밸 우선시하는 세대 등장
signals.significance_reason: 66.5%가 워라밸 1순위 선택은 한국 노동문화 역사적 전환점. 근무여건(31.5%) > 급여(26.8%)는 한국은행 공식 데이터로 구조적 변화 입증.

potential_impact.short_term: 한국 기업 채용 전략 재편; 워라밸 중심 복지 경쟁 심화
potential_impact.mid_term: 장시간 노동 문화 붕괴; 생산성 중심 업무 재설계
potential_impact.long_term: 한국형 워라밸 모델 정착; 일 중심 사회에서 삶의 균형 사회로 전환

signals.title: Hybrid work becomes new default, full remote reserved for highly skilled technical roles
signals.description: Hybrid work becoming new default with full-time remote opportunities increasingly rare and reserved for highly skilled technical roles. Represents post-pandemic work model stabilization with stratification.
signals.leading_indicator: Remote work privilege stratification; high-skill workers gain flexibility, others return to office
signals.significance_reason: Hybrid default represents pandemic work model settlement. Remote work access becoming skill-based privilege signals new workplace inequality dimension.

potential_impact.short_term: Office real estate partial recovery; commute patterns stabilize
potential_impact.mid_term: Geographic wage differentials for remote vs. hybrid roles; talent market stratification
potential_impact.long_term: Two-tier labor market: location-independent high-skill vs. location-bound work

signals.title: AgeTech becomes fastest-growing healthcare innovation sector as aging in place movement booms
signals.description: Aging in place movement giving rise to booming AgeTech market, sector dedicated to tools/technologies helping older adults live independently at home. Baby boomer demographic wave driving market explosion.
signals.leading_indicator: Silver economy infrastructure buildout; aging in place as preferred model over institutional care
signals.significance_reason: Baby boomer wave entering 80s creates unprecedented demand. AgeTech fastest-growing healthcare sector signals massive market opportunity and social transformation.

potential_impact.short_term: AgeTech startup funding surge; home modification industry growth
potential_impact.mid_term: Healthcare shifts from hospital-centric to home-centric; caregiver support technology proliferation
potential_impact.long_term: Majority of elderly living independently at home; institutional care as last resort

signals.title: 2026 heralds return of connection as health pillar, community circles and wellness dinners rising
signals.description: 2026 heralds return of connection as pillar of health with community circles, wellness dinners, hobby-based meetups, and restorative group rituals becoming more popular. Counters digital isolation with in-person social health infrastructure.
signals.leading_indicator: Social connection crisis recognition; community wellness as structured health intervention
signals.significance_reason: Connection as health pillar represents holistic wellness evolution beyond individual optimization. Structured community rituals signal intentional social infrastructure rebuilding.

potential_impact.short_term: Community wellness spaces proliferate; social health programs launched
potential_impact.mid_term: Loneliness epidemic addressed through designed social infrastructure
potential_impact.long_term: Social connection integrated into healthcare; community as prescribed intervention

signals.title: Spiritual wellness apps market to grow from $2.89B in 2026 to $9.91B by 2035
signals.description: Spiritual wellness apps market expected to grow from $2.89B in 2026 to $9.91B by 2035, with meditation and mindfulness apps dominating. AI personalization enabling customized spiritual practice guidance.
signals.leading_indicator: Spiritual wellness digitization and commercialization; AI-mediated spiritual practice normalization
signals.significance_reason: 3.4x market growth in 9 years signals spiritual wellness as major economic sector. AI personalization represents technology-spirituality convergence.

potential_impact.short_term: Spiritual wellness app competition intensifies; AI-guided meditation mainstream
potential_impact.mid_term: Digital spiritual practice as default; traditional institutions adapt or decline
potential_impact.long_term: Spirituality as personalized consumer service; algorithmic spiritual guidance normalization

signals.title: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026, seeking mental peace and deeper meaning
signals.description: People choosing spirituality over partying in 2026 seeking mental peace, emotional balance, deeper meaning. Rising stress, anxiety, burnout made mindful practices more appealing. Social media normalization of spiritual content (devotional music, healing reels, influencer wellness journeys) drives mainstream adoption.
signals.leading_indicator: Nightlife culture decline; spirituality as dominant youth leisure activity
signals.significance_reason: Spiritual practices replacing nightlife represents fundamental youth culture transformation. Social media driving spiritual content virality indicates generational values shift.

potential_impact.short_term: Nightlife industry decline; spiritual retreat/wellness tourism boom
potential_impact.mid_term: Youth culture redefined around mindfulness and meaning-seeking; alcohol consumption plummets
potential_impact.long_term: Post-hedonistic society; spirituality as primary social bonding activity

signals.title: Sound healing and vagus nerve stimulation emerge as major wellness trends for 2026
signals.description: Sound healing set to strike chord in 2026 involving immersion in sound of chimes, gongs, crystal bowls. Focus on stimulating vagus nerve, key pathway in body's stress-regulation system. Represents somatic spirituality approach.
signals.leading_indicator: Somatic spiritual practices mainstreaming; nervous system regulation as spiritual pathway
signals.significance_reason: Sound healing going mainstream signals embodied spirituality trend beyond meditation. Vagus nerve focus bridges science and spiritual practice.

potential_impact.short_term: Sound healing studios proliferate; vagus nerve stimulation devices market growth
potential_impact.mid_term: Somatic therapies integrated into wellness programs; nervous system health as spiritual practice
potential_impact.long_term: Body-centered spirituality as dominant paradigm; mind-body dualism dissolution

signals.title: Emotional fitness treated like physical fitness with breathwork and nervous system regulation
signals.description: Emotional wellness becoming proactive and preventive, treated like physical fitness with breathwork and mind-body practices focused on nervous system regulation. Represents shift from reactive mental health to proactive emotional training.
signals.leading_indicator: Emotional wellness paradigm shift: from treatment to training; preventive emotional health normalization
signals.significance_reason: Emotional fitness framing represents cultural reframe from illness to wellness optimization. Proactive nervous system regulation signals holistic health evolution.

potential_impact.short_term: Breathwork classes proliferate; emotional fitness coaching market emerges
potential_impact.mid_term: Emotional training integrated into education and workplaces; emotional literacy standard
potential_impact.long_term: Mental health reframed as emotional fitness; preventive emotional wellness as life skill

signals.title: AI-powered meditation guides creating personalized practice with VR environments in 2026
signals.description: Integration of meditation with advanced technologies including AI-driven personalization, wearable device compatibility, and VR environments enhancing user engagement. Represents technology-spirituality fusion enabling customized contemplative practice.
signals.leading_indicator: Meditation technology stack maturation; AI and VR as spiritual practice enablers
signals.significance_reason: AI personalization + VR immersion represents technological meditation paradigm. Wearable integration closes biofeedback loop for spiritual practice optimization.

potential_impact.short_term: AI meditation guides mainstream; VR meditation experiences proliferate
potential_impact.mid_term: Personalized spiritual practice as default; technology-mediated contemplation normalization
potential_impact.long_term: Augmented spirituality: technology as integral to contemplative practice

metadata.quality_assurance: All signals reviewed for category fit, significance justification, and impact assessment

excluded_signals.reason: Duplicate - exact URL match in dedup index

metadata.notes: Filtered input contained 48 raw signals. After deduplication, 43 new signals classified. 10 signals flagged as updates to existing database entries not included in new classification count.
